content: Can anyone tell me why all the type hints are needed for the apply and apply_mut methods? https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=957be80e139969f59a2a27cc8fe930b5
If you remove the new type wrappers around the FnOnce types then it can infer properly. Is there a reason that this can't be done through a type that should be optimized away?
